price: E não sabem eles que Deus sabe o de que guardam segredo e o que manifestam?
arabic: أَوَلَا يَعۡلَمُونَ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَعۡلَمُ مَا يُسِرُّونَ وَمَا يُعۡلِنُونَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: awalā yaʿlamūna anna al-laha yaʿlamu mā yusirrūna wamā yuʿ'linūna
